attributes.action: Extend the TfL Oyster Card/Contactless payment methods to Stansted Airport.
attributes.additional_details: A more joined up transport infrastructure should include the ability to travel between the major London airports via contactless payment methods making travelling around the capital much easier for international travellers.
attributes.background: Currently, travellers between London Liverpool Street main line station and Broxbourne can use the Oyster Card/Contactless payment methods. Elsewhere around the capital the Oyster Card/Contactless payment methods can be used from central London to travel out to Heathrow and Gatwick airports.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
